subject: From Desk of Dr.Tony Moore
body:
From Desk of Dr.Tony Moore
Fedex Express, Off Simbiat Abiola Road, 5A Medical Road, Ikeja, Lagos
Phone +2347015292897
 
Attn 
Thanks for being in contact with us, It is my pleasure to read from you. Please before we proceed we want to be sure that you are the real person also that you are the beneficiary of the ATM VISA CARD. in our custody.
My good friend, this is a monetary issue and is full of risk. You need to handle it with care to avoid creating problems on both sides..
Don't be offended by my request for your personal details but it is to ensure that we are dealing with the right person.
   Please I want you to send this below details information of yours to enable me proceed with your ATM VISA CARD delivery through this courier delivery company..
Please reconfirm and carefully fill this form below and send it back to me immediately for security reasons and purposes.
1.Complete Name:.................................................
2.Contact Address:...............................................
3.Telephone Number:..............................................
4.Occupation:.....................................................
5.Sex:............................................................
6.Age:...........................................................
7.Attach a scan copy of your international passport data page or valid National Identification Card/Drivers license.
Thanks and looking forward to your positive and urgent response.
Your Urgent attention is required.
Dr.Tony Moore
Manager, FedEx Courier delivery Service.
+2347015292897

subject: Re:   From Desk of Dr.Tony Moore
body:
Hello Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about the ATM VISA CARD in your custody. It's always exciting to receive unexpected news like this.

I understand that this is a monetary issue and should be handled with care. I appreciate your concern for my safety and security, it's very thoughtful of you.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information about how you came into possession of this card? Also, could you explain why it is under my name? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sharon

subject: Your urgent attention is needed
body:
Dear Sharon

Greetings to you and Hope all is well.

The governing body of the United Nations Monetary Unit authorized us to
investigate long-overdue  delivery your ATM card.
  It is obvious that you have not received your fund which is now in the
amount of $4.2Million)as a compensation award to you, due to past corrupt
Government Officials who almost held your fund to themselves for their
selfish reasons and some individuals who have taken advantage of your fund
all in an attempt to swindle your fund which has led to unnecessary delay
in the receipt and so many losses from your end.

Regarding the final release and subsequent transfer of your approved
payment valued at the sum of $4,200,000.00 US Dollars via ATM Card,
The
United Nations in collaboration with the International Monetary Fund
(IMF) has finalized your ATM card delivery to your designated address
through our courier company

Urgent get back to us with the below information to enable us proceed with
your ATM Visa card delivery.
Your full names,
Your residential address,
Country/City:,
Nationality:.
Occupation:
Telephone number: for immediate dispatch of your consignment.
Your Valid ID or scan of your international  Passport copy

Thanks and waiting for your urgent response
TONY MOOR
